data.title: Recruitment Services
data.summary: End-to-end, compliant hiring support: LMIA streams, recruitment, processing times, and expert representation.

blocks.Title: Recruitment Services
blocks.Subtitle: Hire with confidence. Work with purpose.
blocks.description: We connect skilled, reliable international candidates with Canadian employers across hospitality, healthcare, technology, and agriculture. From LMIA to work permits, our team delivers compliant, efficient recruitment—tailored to your needs.

blocks.Heading: Key Sectors We Serve
blocks.description: Connecting talent across Canada's growing industries

blocks.Heading: LMIA Support Services
blocks.description: End-to-end LMIA strategy, submission, and compliance for Canadian employers.

blocks.Heading: LMIA Streams
blocks.description: Choose the right stream for your position and timeline.

Cards.title: High-Wage Stream
Cards.description: Job offers at or above the median provincial wage. Typical processing: 61 business days.

Cards.title: Low-Wage Stream
Cards.description: Job offers below the median provincial wage. Typical processing: 61 business days.

Cards.title: Agricultural Stream
Cards.description: On-farm roles in livestock, grains, and horticulture. Typical processing: 15 business days.

Cards.title: Global Talent Stream
Cards.description: High-skilled roles in designated occupations. Typical processing: 8 business days.

Cards.title: SAWP
Cards.description: Seasonal Agricultural Worker Program for partner countries. Typical processing: 8 business days.

blocks.Heading: LMIA Application Process
blocks.description: Our comprehensive 6-step approach to LMIA success

steps.title: Eligibility Assessment
steps.description: We review the job offer, employer profile, and program requirements to confirm LMIA needs.

steps.title: Document Preparation
steps.description: We organize documents to establish business legitimacy, wage accuracy, and conditions.

steps.title: Stream Selection
steps.description: We identify high-wage, low-wage, or agricultural streams per the latest ESDC guidance.

steps.title: Application Submission
steps.description: We file via LMIA Online or designated ESDC email and track its progress.

steps.title: Recruitment Compliance
steps.description: We help meet advertising and recruitment obligations to hire Canadians first.

steps.title: Follow-Up & Inspection Readiness
steps.description: We respond to officer requests and prepare you for potential inspections.

blocks.Heading: LMIA Processing Times
blocks.description: Current service standards—update in CMS as needed.

items.listItem: Global Talent & SAWP receive priority—results in just over a week.
High/Low-Wage streams average about 3 months (61 business days).
Agricultural LMIAs process in approximately 3 weeks.
Start early—planning ahead avoids timeline crunches.

blocks.Heading: LMIA Fees & Planning
blocks.description: Typical government filing fees. Professional fees vary by case complexity.

blocks.Heading: External Representation You Can Trust
blocks.description: As authorized representatives, we can act on your behalf throughout the LMIA process, ensuring proper stream selection, compliance, and ongoing advice.

blocks.Heading: Work with Tentacular Immigration Solutions Ltd
blocks.description: From small businesses to large employers, we deliver lawful, timely, and well-documented LMIA applications across Canada.
